frameDefinitions: In this frame a Fugitive presents himself or herself to the Authorities to be subject to the criminal process. '
A Speaker addresses a Proposal made by an Interlocutor, either agreeing to it or rejecting it.
An Agent temporarily places a Theme into a Substance, often with the intention to remove it later.
This frame describes a Theme losing its autonomy and perhaps sustaining material damage as the result of a successful invasion on the behalf of a Conqueror.
A Capitulator who has been opposing a Force, which is typically exerted by a Compeller, ceases opposing that Force.
A Winner has victory over an Loser.
frameExamples: The bank robber <t>surrendered</t> to Berkeley police.
They were <t>rebuffed</t> again in the larger city of Provo. CNI
She <t>dunked</t> her sandwich into some tomato soup.
The Spaniards <t>conquered</t> the Incas with both the Cross and the arquebus
Accordingly, there is no basis to conclude that Tazewell <t>acquiesced</t> in the rule against claim-splitting.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Fugitive</fen> is wanted by the <fen>Authorities</fen> and turns himself or herself in to the <fen>Authorities</fen>.
The <fen>Authorities</fen> are the officials, government or otherwise, who are in charge of initiating the criminal process.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the <fen>Fugitive</fen> surrenders.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the location where the surrendering occurs.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who communicates the reply or response.

This is the person who made the <fen>Proposal</fen> to the <fen>Speaker</fen> and to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates  their response. This frame element stands in for the <fen>Proposal</fen> and is only licensed when the <fen>Proposal</fen>  can be understood from the context.
The <fen>Proposal</fen> is the prior communication or action to which a response is given.
The time interval during which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes their verbal response.
The location in which the <fen>Speaker</fen>  makes a verbal response.
The <fen>Agent</fen> places the <fen>Theme</fen> into a <fen>Substance</fen>.
The <fen>Theme</fen> temporarily goes partially or completely into the Substance.
The <fen>Substance</fen> is the fluid into which the <fen>Theme</fen> is placed. This may be metonymically represented by the container of the fluid.
The location in time when the dunking occurs.
The <fen>Conqueror</fen> is the entity that overtakes the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the land, government, and its people that is seized by the <fen>Conqueror</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Conqueror</fen> seizes the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Conqueror</fen> takes over the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The individual that yields to the <fen>Force</fen> exerted by the <fen>Compeller</fen>.
The matter, usually concerning a course of action, in which the <fen>Capitulator</fen> has disagreed with the <fen>Compeller</fen>.
An individual that intentionally exerts <fen>Force</fen> on the <fen>Capitulator</fen>.

A state of affairs, typically brought about by a <fen>Compeller</fen>, that impinges on the <fen>Capitulator</fen> and eventually causes them to no longer pursue their own view on the <fen>Issue</fen>.
The action that the <fen>Capitulator</fen> engages in after giving in to the <fen>Force</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Capitulator</fen> yields to the <fen>Compeller</fen> on the <fen>Issue</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Capitulator</fen> ceases to oppose the <fen>Force</fen>.
The individual or individuals who beat the <fen>Loser</fen>.
The individual or individuals that get beat by the <fen>Winner</fen>.
When the <fen>Winner</fen> has victory over the <fen>Loser</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Winner</fen> has victory <fen>Loser</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Iran</fex> on Saturday rejected Europe's proposal for ending the standoff over Tehran's nuclear program.

But senior SLN officials had rebuffed <fex>the man who is ever so willing to please
the guerrillas</fex>.
Dr. Carolyn Herrington has accepted <fex>our offer to become Dean of the College of Education</fex> .
This must make <fex>yesterday's</fex> Taliban rebuff all the more wounding.
Legislation that would have required smaller school districts to share administrators has been rebuffed repeatedly <fex>in the Oklahoma House of Representatives</fex>.
<fex>She</fex> dunked her sandwich into some tomato soup.
She dunked <fex>her sandwich</fex> into some tomato soup.
She dunked her sandwich <fex>into some tomato soup</fex>.
<fex>The Achaemenid monarch Cambyses</fex> conquered Egypt in the year 525 BC
Britain had an opportunity to conquer <fex>Europe</fex>.
China 's <fex>1997</fex> takeover would push over 10 per cent of the population out of the colony
<fex>On Planet Earth</fex>, humans prefer to conquer those lands whose acquistion offers some economic benefit or advantage.
I sensed that if <fex>John</fex> caved in to her that it would hurt his game.
Historically, the Senate has yielded to the House <fex>on the issue</fex>.
Relatively new to business, poor Kellie had eventually caved in <fex>to him</fex>.

In 1649, Descartes yielded <fex>to the request of Queen Christina of Sweden that he
join her distinguished circle she was assembling in Stockholm</fex>.
After months of pressure by my staff, I have finally yielded <fex>to doing a commentary on advertising</fex>.
Ms Marinkovic relented <fex>yesterday</fex> under intense international pressure.
John refused to heed the barons? early calls for reform, but in June 1215 he capitulated <fex>at Runnymede</fex>.
